text: Earl E. Devaney (June 8, 1947 – April 15, 2022) was an American police officer and politician. He was the Inspector General for the United States Department of the Interior from 1999 until 2011.U.S. Department of the Interior - Inspector General Earl E. Devaney BiographyObama picks F&M; alum to oversee stimulus plan He was the Chairman of the Recovery Accountability and Transparency Board from 2009 until 2011. Devaney was from Massachusetts. He was also a United States Secret Service agent. Devaney died on April 15, 2022 at the age of 74.Earl Devaney, ‘larger-than-life’ former Interior IG, dies at 74 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American police officers Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Earl Devaney
